sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { validAge:boolean = true; validName:boolean = true; validEmail:boolean = true; validSubmit:boolean = false; formValidation = new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.minLength(3)]), age:new FormControl(null,[Validators.required,Validators.min(20),Validators.max(40)]), email:new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.email]) } ) submit(){ this.validAge = this.formValidation.controls.age.valid; this.validName = this.formValidation.controls.name.valid; this.validEmail = this.formValidation.controls.email.valid; this.validSubmit = this.formValidation.valid; } }
Registration Form
Name Length Must be more than 3
Age Between 22 and 40
Not Valid Email
Not Valid Email
